abilities.name: Revolver
abilities.description: Fire an automatic revolver, dealing 550 damage every 0.5s. Has a maximum Ammo count of 6 and is fully effective up to 50 units.

abilities.name: Defiance
abilities.description: Punch forward, striking enemies in front of you. Deals 520 damage and is fully effective up to 20 units.

abilities.name: Reversal
abilities.description: Absorb enemy ranged attacks in front of you. After 1.4s, launch a blast that deals 75% of the damage you Absorbed.

abilities.name: Nether Step
abilities.description: Quickly dash in any direction up to 3 times before needing to recharge. Holding <CMD=GBA_Jump> reduces your fall speed in the air. Has a range of 31.5 units.

abilities.name: Accursed Arm
abilities.description: Take flight for 4s and mutate your Revolver. Your mutated Revolver shoots every 0.5s and deals 1000 damage in a 15-unit-radius area. Using this ability consumes 40% of your Ultimate charge and each shot consumes an additional 15%. This Revolver has a maximum Ammo count of 4 and a range of 400 units. Can be refired to cancel.

talents.name: Dark Stalker

talents.name: Defiant Fist

talents.name: Godslayer

abilities.name: Chrono-Cannon
abilities.description: A futuristic weapon that can be charged up over 1.4s, increasing your Accuracy and damage falloff range, and firing fewer shots depending on its charge. This weapon deals 840 damage, has a maximum Ammo count of 6, and is fully effective up to 50 units at base charge.

abilities.name: Setback
abilities.description: Fire a concentrated ball of chronon energy that Rewinds its victim back to where they physically were 4s in the past. This blast reverts their Health to its lowest point during that period.

abilities.name: Stasis Field
abilities.description: Create a temporal Barrier in front of you that Absorbs all ranged attacks and projectiles. This barrier lasts 5s.

abilities.name: Second Chance
abilities.description: Rewind yourself to where you physically were 4s in the past. Your Health is reverted to its highest value during that period.

abilities.name: Exile
abilities.description: Supercharge your chronon accelerator for 5s. While in this state, you have 3 modified chronon weapon shots that will Banish enemies for 4s. Banished enemies can not be interacted with by anyone. Using this ability consumes 40% of your Ultimate charge and each shot consumes an additional 20%. While using this ability, you are Immune to Crowd Control effects. Can be refired to cancel.

talents.name: Deja vu

talents.name: Temporal Divide

talents.name: Unstable Fissure

cards.name: Beyond The Veil

cards.name: Continuum Shift

cards.name: Steady Arm

abilities.name: Judgement
abilities.description:
Throw your hammer in an attack chain of medium, medium, heavy, dealing 525 damage on medium hits and 630 on heavy hits.

Passive: Ire
Taking and dealing damage increases your Ire, which reduces the damage you take by up to 12% at 100% Ire. While you are above 85% Ire, you deal 12% increased damage. Using a basic ability above the Ire threshold augments that ability. Using any basic ability consumes Ire.

abilities.name: Reckoning
abilities.description:
After a brief windup, send out a projectile that explodes into an area in front of you, dealing 300 damage and Lifting enemies hit for 0.25s.

Ire threshold: Reduce the Cooldown of this ability.

abilities.name: Sanctuary
abilities.description:
Create a series of 5 Deployable wall segments in a semi-circle, each with 2500 Health. This ability consumes 20 Ire. Cannot be canceled.

Ire threshold: Increase the Health of each segment by 50%.

abilities.name: Conviction
abilities.description:
Dash forward, carrying up to one enemy with you. Slamming an enemy into a wall will deal damage and stun them. Hitting them into your own Sanctuary walls deals additional damage and Stuns for longer. This ability consumes 15% Ire.

Ire threshold: This ability is used faster.

abilities.name: Deliverance
abilities.description: Rise into the air for up to 6s, reducing the damage you take by 50%. Fire at the ground to throw your hammer, dealing 725 damage and applying Knockback on hit. Shortly after your hammer lands, teleport to it, dealing 250 additional damage and applying a large Knockback in an area.

talents.name: Eternal
talents.description: Your Ire no longer decays due to not taking or dealing damage, but you no longer gain the passive damage increase while above Ire threshold.

talents.name: Persistence
talents.description: Gain 30% Lifesteal on your hits with Judgement.

talents.name: Tempering
talents.description: Augment Reckoning, Sanctuary, and Conviction, but increase their base Cooldown by 25%.

cards.name: Depths of Despair

cards.name: Eternal Strife
cards.description: Using an ability above Ire threshold Heals you for {scale=75|75}.

cards.name: Piety
cards.description: Heal for {scale=75|75} after activating Conviction.

cards.name: Righteous Fury
cards.description: Reduce the Cooldown of Sanctuary by {scale=0.6|0.6}s after using Reckoning.

cards.name: Solemn Watch
cards.description: Increase the distance traveled by Conviction by {scale=6|6}%.

cards.description: Increase your maximum Health by {scale=150|150}.

cards.name: True Conviction
cards.description: Reduce the damage your other allies take by {scale=5|5}% while they are within 35 units of the middle wall segment of your Sanctuary.

This ability ignores Shields, is fully effective up to 5 units, and will hit enemies up to 45 units away. Colliding with an enemy will detonate King Bomb.

abilities.name: War
abilities.description:
Consume 1 Ammo to unleash your rapier in a chain of attacks, dealing up to 350 damage per hit to enemies. Fully effective up to 65 units. War shares an Ammo pool with Love.

Passive - Sharp Momentum:
Hitting an enemy with War gives you a stack of Sharp Momentum, increasing the rate of fire of Love by 2% for 5s. Maximum of 5 stacks and each stack expires independently.

abilities.name: Love
abilities.description:
Consume 3 ammo to fire your gun once every 0.75s, dealing 350 damage per shot and Slowing enemies hit by 10% for 2s, stacking up to 3 times. Fully effective up to 100 units. Love shares an Ammo pool with War.

Passive - Piercing Momentum:
Hitting an enemy with Love gives you a stack of Piercing Momentum, increasing the rate of fire of War by 2% for 5s. Maximum of 5 stacks and each stack expires independently.

abilities.name: Rogue's Tempo
abilities.description: Shoot out a Piercing projectile that travels more quickly based on the total number of your Piercing and Sharp Momentum stacks. Deals 700 damage and stuns enemies hit for 0.7s.

abilities.name: Deadly Momentum
abilities.description: Twirl forwards, dealing 300 damage and knocking back enemies hit during the dash. While dashing, the damage you take is reduced by 30%. At the end of the dash, stop and whirl in place, dealing 450 damage to enemies in an area and reduce the Cooldown of this ability by 1s for each enemy hit. You can reactivate this ability early to stop and whirl sooner.

This Mark will bounce to the nearest ally if the Marked falls.

This Slow persists for 0.5s after leaving the area. Can be reactivated to cancel.

abilities.name: Yokai Doll
abilities.description:
Stab your straw doll, dealing 200 damage every 0.6s and applying stacks of Curse to your currently targeted foe. Other targets inflicted with Curse will have up to 2 stacks stripped from them to increase the Curse applied to your target by 1. Deals double damage to Deployables and deployed Shields.

Passive: Curse

Your abilities can apply up to 5 stacks of Curse. For each stack, the target deals 2% less outgoing damage and takes 20% increased damage from Yokai Doll and Savage Tear. Cursed enemies are granted a Reveal on you.

abilities.name: Savage Tear
abilities.description: Viciously rip through your Yokai Doll, dealing 400 damage and, at maximum stacks of Curse, Disarming your target for 1s. Deals increased damage per stack of Curse on your target.

abilities.name: Spirit Lure
abilities.description: Place up to 3 traps. Reactivate this ability when an enemy gets close to teleport to the most recently triggered lure, dealing 100 damage, applying 3 stacks of Curse, and applying a 1.5s Fear to nearby foes. After reactivation, Spirit Lure will go on a longer Cooldown.

abilities.name: Body and Soul
abilities.description: Project yourself outward for 2s, leaving a physical manifestation behind. While traveling, you are Ethereal and gain increased Movement Speed, but your body is vulnerable to damage, at a reduced rate. You can reactivate this ability to Teleport back to your body, or your body will Teleport to you if not reactivated.

abilities.name: Bitter Betrayal
abilities.description: Inflict a deadly curse on your target, designating them as a Betrayer. After 1.75s, your target explodes outwards in a series of projectiles. They and any enemy hit will gain 5 stacks of Curse and take 42 damage every 0.2s for 3.2s. Damage is increased based on the number of Curse stacks.

talents.name: Empowered Curse
talents.description: Increase your Ultimate charge rate by 3% and Movement Speed by 5% per stack of Curse currently on enemies.

talents.name: Spirit Bombs
talents.description: Spirit Lures become timed mines and can no longer be reactivated, exploding a small duration after being triggered to deal damage, Fear, and apply Curse stacks. Your trap placement now has increased Cooldown

talents.name: Unfinished Business
talents.description: Extend the duration of your Body and Soul by 1s. After the ability ends, Heal for 70% of the damage your body took (minimum of 15% max health) while traveling, unaffected by Cauterize

abilities.name: Heart of Crimson
abilities.description:
Lillith shoots a charged bolt of blood from her esoteric cube every 1s, dealing 625 damage. Has a maximum Ammo count of 4 and is fully effective up to 200 units.

Passive - Blood:
Lillith uses a modified Blood Health pool that acts as both your Champion Health and as a resource to cast her abilities. Both Swarm and Death Wings use some of her Blood to use.

abilities.name: Blood Hex
abilities.description: Lillith casts a hex on an enemy or an ally, placing either a damaging or Healing effect on the target that applies over time. Enemies take 1.5% of their current Health every 0.325s, while Allies are Healed for a scaling value up to 600 every 0.5s based on the duration of the ability. Lillith regenerates Blood while Blood Hex is active. Has a range of 95 units.

abilities.description:
Lillith summons a circular swarm of bats to Heal her allies for 75 every 0.25s and damage her enemies for 55 every 0.25s. Hold down the activation button to channel this ability for longer, increasing the Healing and damage it does after activation. Has 3 channeled states depending on the duration of channeling. Lasts for 5.75s and has a range of 85 units.

Costs 825 Blood to cast.

Lillith leaps into the air and gains air control. Reactivate Death Wings to slam directly into the ground, dealing 225 damage in a 15 unit radius.

Costs 350 Blood to cast.

Lillith takes 50% less damage and moves 50% slower while activating this ability. During this ability, Lillith has increased Movement Speed, jumps higher, and regenerates 475 Blood every 1s. Lasts for 8s.

abilities.name: Realm Breaker
abilities.description:
Punch and send out energy in a five hit attack chain, dealing 200 damage quickly for the first three hits and 425 damage slowly for the last two. This chain resets to the first attack on a miss, or after not firing for 1.25s. Deal an extra 75 damage if your target is within 20 units of you. Has no Ammo or Reload.

Passive - Queen of Change:
Gain up to 20% Bonus Healing the closer you are to an Objective Point. Gain a static 10% Bonus Healing on Maps without an Objective.

abilities.name: Rift Slash
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that leaves behind an Abyssal Rift when it explodes; the projectile detonates on contact or after reaching its max travel distance. Hold down the activation button to channel this ability, causing the projectile to deal more damage and travel farther, reaching max power after channeling for 1.1s. The projectile will deal 200 damage and travel 25 units at base, 275 damage and 50 when charged >0.55s, and 350 damage and 100 units when charged for 1.1s. The Abyssal Rift left behind deals 50 damage to enemies within 30 units every 0.5s, reducing hit enemies' Movement Speed by 35% for 1s. After 2s the Abyssal Rift explodes, dealing 200 damage to enemies within 15 units.

abilities.name: Abyssal Fortress
abilities.description: Call forth an Abyssal Shield with up to 4500 Health at the target location, placing it up to 90 units away. The Shield is stronger the closer it is placed to you, losing 1500 Health for every 30 units its placed away from you.

abilities.name: Royal Presence
abilities.description: Summon a poison aura for 6s that follows you and Poisons enemies within 60 units for 5% of their maximum health over 6s. While this aura is active, any damage you take is instead stored, being dealt to you over 4s with additional damage refreshing the duration. Pressing the activation key again will send out Abyssal Chains that pull enemies within 50 units towards you, but will end the ability early.

abilities.name: Chaos Nexus
abilities.description: Tear a rift into the Abyss, becoming CC immune and dealing 100 damage to enemies within 50 units every 0.5s and pulling them in. After two pulses, stomp and cause an explosion, dealing 600 damage to enemies and stunning them for 2s.

abilities.name: Hellfire Gatling
abilities.description:
An Abyssal, soul-shredding Gatling gun that spins up before firing. After 1s, it starts to fire, reaching its maximum Attack Speed after an additional 2s. At maximum rev, it deals 40 damage every 0.05s. Has a maximum Ammo count of 500, and is fully effective up to 80 units.

Passive: Every six shots that hit an enemy shatters a part of their soul, creating a Soul Fragment. Soul Fragments can be collected by colliding with them or by activating Soul Harvest.

abilities.description: Savagely stomp the ground and send forth a shockwave in a 45-degree cone that deals 999 damage and Stuns enemies for 1.2s. This ability Pierces enemies, destroys Shields and Deployable walls, and has a range of 100 units. You are rooted and Immune to Crowd Control while using this ability. You can turn up to 60 degrees in either direction after activation.

Landing a killing blow on the Dead Ringer decoy will reveal that enemy to you for 0.5s. Consumes 4 Pips.

Enter Stealth and hide yourself from vision. Entering Stealth consumes 33% of your Energy and requires at least 40% Energy to cast. While Stealthed, your Energy is drained over time. Getting too close to an enemy will Reveal you to them.

Passive: You have Energy, which is used to Stealth and regenerates over time.

Heavy Blade lodges itself into any environment it collides with and can be reactivated to recall the blade, passing through everything in the world. Heavy Blade deals 500 damage to enemies as it passes through after recall.

Whirling Blades: Launch yourself upwards, whirling your blade around you and becoming Immune to damage. On landing, deal 900 damage to all enemies within 30 units.

Mag Dump - Unload your entire magazine, dealing 450 damage for every 10 bullets fired. Mag Dump has a maximum Range of 100 units and is fully effective up to 10 units.

Automatic - Fire off your automatic SMG dealing 200 damage every 0.175 seconds. Has a maximum Range of 150 units and is fully effective up to 95 units.

abilities.name: Deadly Scythe
abilities.description:
A Scythe that sends out projectiles that deal damage over a short duration. Its attack chain is: Medium, Light, Light, Heavy.
Light: 300 damage every 0.35s.
Medium: 470 damage every 1s.
Heavy: 680 every 1.2s.

Passive: Hits with your scythe provide a Darkness stack to you. Using Dark Siphon or Obliteration will consume all Stacks, Healing you for 100 over 1s per Stack and augmenting the ability if at 5 Stacks. You can have a maximum of 5 Stacks.

abilities.name: Obliteration
abilities.description:
Jump up and slash down around you, dealing 500 damage and applying a small Knockback to enemies hit. While using this ability, you are Immune to Damage and Crowd Control.

Using this ability with 5 Stacks of Darkness deals an additional 300 damage and Slows enemies hit by 30% for 2s.

abilities.name: Dark Siphon
abilities.description:
Launch a vicious projectile from your Scythe, dealing 200 damage on hit and an additional 400 damage over 1.5s. Hitting an enemy causes you to Regenerate 300 Health over 2s.

Using this ability with 5 Darkness Stacks will Cripple the enemy hit for 1.5s.

abilities.name: Tendril
abilities.description: Manifest your will, propelling yourself towards your target with a tendril. Can hit players to pull you to them.

abilities.name: Harbinger's Wrath
abilities.description:
Channel your wrath to hunt your enemies, increasing your Movement Speed by 60% and decreasing the damage you take by 40%.

Select a target in range with to hit them, Stunning, Crippling, and Silencing them. Enemies above 66% maximum Health take 1100 damage, while enemies at or below 66% maximum Health are Executed. This ability lasts 5s or until you select a target. Can be refired to cancel. If your target dies during the Stun, refund 25% Ultimate Charge.

abilities.name: Caustic Spray
abilities.description:
Spray acid from your Maw, dealing 38 damage every 0.1s. Hitting the ground leaves behind a pool of acid that lasts 4s. Has a range of 105 units and a maximum of 6 pools placed at once.

Travel Form (Trail of Acid): Drop a series of 5 acid pools behind you as you roll. Has an 8s Cooldown.

Acid Pools: Each pool deals 33 damage every 0.25s and Slows enemies affected by 15%.

abilities.name: Piercing Quills
abilities.description:
Fire out a Piercing quill every 0.15s, dealing 170 damage on hit and exploding for 50 damage in a small area shortly after. Has a maximum of 8 charges.

Travel Form (Acceleration): Charge forward for 4s. Hitting an enemy will deal 500 damage and apply a Knockback. Cannot be canceled.

abilities.description:
Hunker down for up to 4s, increasing your base Damage Reduction by 25%. After this ability ends, deal damage to enemies within 25 units based on the duration of the ability. Base damage is 300 and maximum damage is 1100. You cannot be stunned while this ability is active. Can be refired to cancel early.

Travel Form (Primal Vision): Let out a series of 5 pulses that briefly reveal enemies within 150 units to yourself and your team.

abilities.name: Form Swap
abilities.description:
Swap between your Planted and Travel forms, gaining access to a new set of abilities. In Planted form, you are unable to move. Swapping forms cannot be prevented by Cripple.

Passive: Yagorath has a base Damage Reduction of 30% while Planted and is immune to most forms of Crowd Control, instead having a portion of the Crowd Control duration converted into a Stun.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Target an enemy to start pulling them to you, swapping your current Health for a new 3750-Health pool. Your target is immune to damage and Crowd Control and cannot move during this process, but can still fire their weapon at you. If your Health pool is depleted before they are devoured, you drop your target; otherwise, they are Executed. Can only be used in Planted Form and has a minimum activation Range of 30 units.

abilities.name: Whirl
abilities.description: Lunge forward while swinging your blade in a deadly arc, dealing 400 damage to nearby enemies.  Has a range of 50 units.

abilities.name: Spite
abilities.description: Launch forward and Stun an enemy with a series of vicious melee attacks, dealing 2000 damage over 1.5s. While attacking, you are Immune to Crowd Control. Has a range of 90 units. Failing to hit an enemy will refund 30% Ultimate charge.

talents.name: Guillotine
talents.description: [Spite] Spite deals 20% of its target's maximum Health with each hit.

talents.name: Smolder
talents.description: [Billow] Heal for 15% of your maximum Health per second while using Billow.

talents.name: Yomi
talents.description: [Weapon] Your heavy hit with Inferno Blade deals an additional 150 damage.
